name: Vial of Lifeblood
effect:
:instant: Remove up to 3 :damage: from one of your units.

— OR —

:ongoing: For this Combat, your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :health_points:.
flavor_text: You find a mystical shrine hidden among the trees. Floating above the altar is a vial said to contain the Blood of Life. You very carefully remove it, taking care not to disturb anything else.
